verses.text: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, do \w not|strong="H1732"\w* rebuke \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Your|strong="H5921"\w* anger or discipline \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Your|strong="H5921"\w* wrath.

\w Be|strong="H3068"\w* merciful \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H3256"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* frail; heal \w me|strong="H3256"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* bones \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* agony.
\w My|strong="H3068"\w* soul \w is|strong="H3068"\w* deeply distressed. \w How|strong="H3588"\w* long, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w how|strong="H3588"\w* long?

Turn, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* deliver \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*; \w save|strong="H5315"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w* \w because|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* loving devotion.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H7725"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* no mention \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w You|strong="H7725"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w death|strong="H5315"\w*; \w who|strong="H3068"\w* can praise \w You|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* Sheol?

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* am weary \w from|strong="H7585"\w* groaning; all night \w I|strong="H3588"\w* flood \w my|strong="H3588"\w* bed \w with|strong="H7585"\w* weeping \w and|strong="H3034"\w* drench \w my|strong="H3588"\w* couch \w with|strong="H7585"\w* tears.

\w My|strong="H3605"\w* eyes fail \w from|strong="H3915"\w* grief; \w they|strong="H3605"\w* grow dim \w because|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* foes.

Depart \w from|strong="H5869"\w* \w me|strong="H5869"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* workers \w of|strong="H5869"\w* iniquity, \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H5869"\w* heard \w my|strong="H3605"\w* weeping.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w cry|strong="H6963"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w*; \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* accepts \w my|strong="H8085"\w* prayer.

\w All|strong="H3947"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* enemies \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* ashamed \w and|strong="H3068"\w* dismayed; \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* turn \w back|strong="H3947"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* sudden disgrace.
